content: do not let go of it 4 bring the loop end to the cuts ends and hold the two together the cord should twist up on itself 5 smooth out the cord to even out the twist and knot the cut end 2 6 thread the cord through the drawstring round of the bag and knot the loop and cut ends together leaving about 1cm for a tassel finish 7 repeat with the other cord but on step 6 make sure you start at the opposite side of the bag from the previous cord tassel working the bottom edge 3
